item.title: Wounded Syrians enter Turkey for medical treatment
item.description:
Five Syrians, who were wounded during clashes in their country, crossed in Turkey and were taken to hospital on Monday.***

HATAYÂ 

Ambulances and medical teams, waiting in Kavalcik, Kusakli and Bukulmez villages near Turkish-Syrian border, carried five Syrians, who were shot from their arms and legs, to hospital.
They were taken to Reyhanli State Hospital for treatment.
